DESCRIPTIONS: All Banned and Limited cards can be played.

${modID}:CheaterPower.NAME: Cheater

${modID}:LifeSupportPower.NAME: Life Support Power
DESCRIPTIONS: turns, any damage that would kill you reduces you to 1 hp instead.

DESCRIPTIONS: If your HP is full, gain #b
[E] at the start of each turn
